procedure.title: Call for Tenders for the provision of School Meal Services to two Community National Schools
procedure.description: Cork Education and Training Board is seeking tenders for the provision of school meals to two Community National Schools (CNS) under its remit. The initial requirement is for the provision of hot school meals as per the DSP School Meals (Local projects) Scheme. This public procurement competition will be divided into two (2) Lots (each a “Lot”) as described below. Each Lot will result in a separate contract. Lot 1: Mallow CNS, Kingsfort Avenue, Castlepark, Mallow, Co. Cork. P51 P5V2 Lot 2: Carrigtwohill CNS, Station Rd, Terry's-Land, Carrigtwohill, Co. Cork. T45 YY66
